beers.description: Our bright and beautiful fresh orange juice pale ale.
beers.summary: Our bright and beautiful fresh orange juice pale ale.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #20. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #20. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of apricot flesh, lemon meringue, overripe peach, white pine sap.
beers.description: Extra IPA 7.5% Brewed with an enormous amount of flaked corn and pillowy oats. Timelessly hopped in the kettle with Columbus then dry hopped with Chinook, Crystal and Lemondrop.
beers.summary:
Extra IPA 7.5% Brewed with an enormous amount of flaked corn and pillowy oats. Timelessly hopped in the kettle with Columbus then dry hopped with Chinook, Crystal and Lemondrop.
Notes of apricot flesh, lemon meringue, overripe peach, white pine sap.

beers.notes: Notes of fresh cut grass, citrus leaves, papaya flesh, and dank greenery.
beers.description: Wet Hop IPA 6.0%  Brewed with oats. Aggressively dry hopped with an enormous amount of Hallertau Blanc wet hops that were preserved in their fresh state by our friends in Hallertau through a proprietary process.
beers.summary:
Wet Hop IPA 6.0%  Brewed with oats. Aggressively dry hopped with an enormous amount of Hallertau Blanc wet hops that were preserved in their fresh state by our friends in Hallertau through a proprietary process.
Notes of fresh cut grass, citrus leaves, papaya flesh, and dank greenery.

beers.notes: Notes of strawberry water ice, wildflower bouquet, and a picnic blanket.
beers.description: Strawberry Saison 4.7% Brewed entirely with Pilsner malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Mosaic, Hibiscus and Rose petals. Fermented and conditioned for many moons on top of strawberry puree. Brewed with our friend Nels Cline.
beers.summary:
Strawberry Saison 4.7% Brewed entirely with Pilsner malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Mosaic, Hibiscus and Rose petals. Fermented and conditioned for many moons on top of strawberry puree. Brewed with our friend Nels Cline.
Notes of strawberry water ice, wildflower bouquet, and a picnic blanket.

beers.notes: Notes of citrus rind, sage, soft  cereal grains, and light tropical musk.
beers.beer: The Light That Spills Out of the Hole in Your Head
beers.description: Clementine IPA. 5.9% Brewed with oats and an abundance of house processed clementine zest and juice. Dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo. A throwback to an early BrewCafe favorite.
beers.summary:
Clementine IPA. 5.9% Brewed with oats and an abundance of house processed clementine zest and juice. Dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo. A throwback to an early BrewCafe favorite.
Notes of citrus rind, sage, soft  cereal grains, and light tropical musk.

beers.notes: Notes of sticky toffee candies, maple syrup, salt water taffy and smoke trails on the horizon.
beers.description: Sweet Lebanon Bologna Inspired Barelywine. 10.5% Brewed with Vienna, Pilsner, malted oats, rauch malt and brown sugar. Gently hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Fermented and conditioned for many moons in stainless on a thoughtful amount of Madagascar vanilla beans and sweet orange peel.
beers.summary:
Sweet Lebanon Bologna Inspired Barelywine. 10.5% Brewed with Vienna, Pilsner, malted oats, rauch malt and brown sugar. Gently hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Fermented and conditioned for many moons in stainless on a thoughtful amount of Madagascar vanilla beans and sweet orange peel.
Notes of sticky toffee candies, maple syrup, salt water taffy and smoke trails on the horizon.
